compile.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc
compile.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The document was compiled by the Department of Health
The report was compiled from a survey of 5,000 households.
compile.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to put a set of instructions into a computer in a form that it can understand and use
compile.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to collect information together and write it into a list, report, book etc
compile.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Our staff are compiling the material for an on-line database.
compile.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to put instructions into a computer in a form that the computer can understand and use
compile.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: You do not have to exit the editor, compile the program, run the program, then reload the editor to fix any bugs.
